text:
well to start off, the hours online are wrong. Lake Zurich's Little Caesars is only open til 9 so stop calling at 10:40 pm and getting mad at them.

text: I work right near here and they have been so generous enough to deliver it because we don't have any time to come pick it up! They are always so kind and sweet.  A gentleman came and dropped our pizzas off today and explained that the storm ‚Ä¶More

name: D Mills
text: Excellent food. The Super adorable chick working here makes me smile every time I see her. Dont ask for her number though cuz she'll shoot you down quite cleverlyüòÇ

text: I was trying to come here on Saturday with my family, but the problem was that the place wasn‚Äôt here. I liked their commercial though so +2 stars

name: Christian Szabo
text: Hot and ready my rear. They had 0 pizzas ready now 5 minutes later still no pizzas and 4 people waiting.  If you have a choice as I go to a different location

name: Beau Jeffrey
text: üò° I have been going to Little Caesars for years & I have ‚ù§Ô∏è'd the "Hot & Ready" concept. When they recently added the "BESTEST" pizza (pepperoni & cheese), I jumped on it & that's all I've gotten since it came out. It's a great pizza for a ‚Ä¶More

name: Matt Mottier
text: Take out Little Caesars Pizza where you can pre-order and walk up and wait for your order.  Can be busy occasionally.  Great place for cheap, but decent thin crust pizza.

name: Carl Sagan
text: Cheap pizza, fast service. Competent employees. I'd call ahead and tell them what to have ready because randomly every soccer team in the tri-state area eats here simultaneously and there'll be a wait. But it's few and far between. The employees are always nice, keep it up guys!

name: Chris
text: Probably the fastest one in the area, probably because the staff isn‚Äôt all high schoolers like the others but either way; this little Cesars never disappoints

name: Chris Coup
text: How can you not enjoy an entire hot pizza for $5?  Great last minute dinner choice. :)

name: Kerrington mommy Knowles
text: Worst customer service experience ever! Was attempting to order via phone was put on hold but by the time I arrived they still had not taken me off hold. I ordered and was given a 10 minute pick up which turned into 25 minutes and everyone ahead of me had their 10 minutes and was out well before.

name: Ryan Madigan
text: You can't beat the price and the pizza was made fresh.

name: Jon Randhurst
text: whats up with not answering the phones 20 minutes before close. i understand not wanting to do a delivery before close, but i am trying to pick up 1 cheese pizza, as simple as that, and you guys dont answer you phones. its 10;40, you guys ‚Ä¶More

text: I arrived 45 min to close and they had no hot and ready pizzas made. Were out of crazy bread. When i entered the store i was not greeted and was waiting for about ten minutes before the employee came out from the back. Horrible service . . ‚Ä¶More
